data.title: Zones: First Choice for IT
data.text:
Zones' Technology Solution Centers achieve new ISO certification.

All four of our US TSCs were recently certified for ISO 14001:2015 for environmental management and re-certified for ISO 9001:2015 for quality management.

The certifications show our commitment to our partners, clients, and planet.
